table.name: jiveBetterBookmark
table.description: provides bookmarking for the BetterBookmark plugin

column.name: markedType
column.description: the type of entity which is being bookmarked

column.name: markedId
column.description: the unique id related to the entity which is being bookmarked

column.name: creatorId
column.description: the id of the entity which created the betterbookmark

column.name: subject
column.description: subject or title of the bookmark

column.name: creationDate
column.description: the date and time on which this betterbookmark was created

column.name: modificationDate
column.description: the date and time on which this betterbookmark was last modified
